name: Lucky Blast!
description:
Tap to blast matching elements. Once you've blasted all elements, you can move up to the next level!
Challenge your mind and solve the puzzles. It's easy and super exciting! Become a puzzle master level by level. Train your brain by playing with speed—the faster the better!

How to play
- Find a group of two or more matching elements!
- Tap to blast them!
- Use powerful boosters to help pass levels!
- Pass levels one by one to become a master!

Game Features
- Easy to play: just tap to blast!
- Fun elements: thousands of elements randomly appear level by level!
- Unlock powerful boosters: awesome tools to help you level up!
- Enhance focus and concentration: addicting gameplay to train your brain!
- Autosave and offline: you can play at anytime and anywhere!
